section.title: Reading resources from plug-ins
section.para: You can access files in your plug-in via two different approaches: via the FileLocator class or via an Eclipse specific URL. Both approaches require that your plug-in defines a dependency to the org.eclipse.core.runtime plug-in.
Both approaches return a URL which can be used to get an InputStream .
